pullRequest.title: Representation of frames in DebuggingView API.
pullRequest.bodyText: DebuggingView extended with API for frames.

nodes.bodyText: Recently I wrote a philippic against using default methods, but given the one to many proximity - e.g. there is very likely just a single implementation of these interfaces in the debugger impl modules - I expect no clashes and default methods are the easiest way to extend the interfaces.
